name: Flood Alert!
description:
Welcome to Flood Alert!

The game about Property Flood Resilience!

Click Run game above to start the game!

This game is designed to help children and young people understand the importance of preparing for flooding.

After playing this game, you will know more about and the value of property flood resilience measures (PFR), as well as how they can resist flooding and help in the recovery after!

Help your dog Dougal to put property flood resilience measures around the family home to prepare for a flood.

Next it’s time to clear up the mess left behind. Make sure you leave the downstairs rooms nice and clean to get the highest score possible!

After the end, Dougal will let you know how you did and will give you a score out of 5 stars! 

You can find out more about Property Flood Resilience by visiting:

 Yorkshire Flood Resilience | What is property flood resilience?

Big thanks to  Chris Skinner - SeriousGeoGames for their support as well!
